ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is x_ActClassDocumentEntryAct
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_DocumentActMood
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CD

MAY contain at least one [1..*] encounterLocation, where its type is Encounter Location (CONF-437)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Encounter Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.45)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] patientInstruction, where its type is Patient Instruction (CONF-441, CONF-333)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ (has subject)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Patient Instruction (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.49)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ageObservation, where its type is Age Observation (CONF-445)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ (has subject)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Age Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.38)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] medicationActivity, where its type is Medication Activity (CONF-446)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.24)

The value for act/code in a procedure activity SHOULD be selected from LOINC (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96), and MAY be selected from CPT-4 (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12), ICD9 Procedures (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.104), ICD10 Procedure Coding System (codeSystem 2.16.840.1.113883.6.4). (CONF-434)
MAY satisfy: contain one or more Act / performer, to represent those practioners who performed the procedure. (CONF-438)
MAY satisfy: A procedure activity contains one or more entryRelationship / @typeCode="RSON", the target of which represents the indication or reason for the procedure. (CONF-439)

entryRelationship / @typeCode="RSON" in a procedure activity SHALL have a target of problem act (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27), problem observation (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.28), or some other clinical statement. (CONF-440)
MAY satisfy: have one or more associated consents, represented in the CCD Header as ClinicalDocument / authorization / consent (CONF-442)
SHALL satisfy: contains one or more sources of information (CONF-447)
MAY satisfy: have one or more Act / participant [@typeCode="DEV"], the target of which is a product instance template (templateID: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.52) (CONF-448)

participant / participantRole / id SHOULD be set to equal a Supply / participant / participantRole / id to indicate that the Procedure and the Supply are referring to the same product instance. (CONF-452)
